page.title: 09ADULT'S LIFESTYLE
page.content: Although surrounded by larger towns eg. Birmingham & Coventry, where unemployment is a problem, most people in the area are in work. The nature of employment ranges through the spectrum from professional to unskilled labour. In our class survey 25% of parents were self_ employed. 12% work in the area , the rest commuting to other districts _ (25% to Birmingham.) Most female employment is local enabling mothers to be home for their children's return from school. Leisure time pursuits include gardening, sport,needlecrafts of various forms, D.I.Y. occupations, radio & television. All families have one car, several have two. (This is almost a necessity if peoples work or interests necessitate leaving the villages.)
